title: FS: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 2 mk
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 2 mk
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/mathewson_zps0wpc5a0x.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/mathewson%20back_zpsakwcb8dm.jpg[/IMG]

This card has been "signed" on the back by a "J Dugan". Whether or not this was the future baseball player Joe Dugan is up for speculation. He would have been the right age to collect and was born a short distance from Matty's PA home.

Asking $275 delivered.

Tom C
signed to state that this was his baseball card
Tom- Your PM Box is Full!
Got the card today, Thanks for the deal Tom!
